q.en: If you were accepted into a one-month intensive IELTS program, how would you effectively use at least 2 hours a day for English study? (30-50 words)
q.uz: Agar siz bir oylik intensiv IELTS dasturiga qabul qilinsangiz, kuningizdan kamida 2 soatni ingliz tili mashg‘ulotlariga qanday qilib samarali foydalanar edingiz? (30-50 so’z)

q.en: Describe a time when you faced a significant challenge in preparing for the IELTS exam. How did you overcome it? (30-50 words)
q.uz: Ingliz tili darajangizni ancha yaxshilagan biror vaziyatni eslang. Qanday strategiya yoki mashg‘ulot sizga yordam bergan? (30-50 so’z)

q.en: You want to give your brother or sister advice on how to prepare for the IELTS Speaking test. What 3 pieces of advice would you give them? (80-100 words)
q.uz: Siz ukangiz yoki singlingizga IELTS Speaking bo‘yicha maslahat bermoqchisiz. Ularga qanday 3 ta maslahat berasiz? (80-100 so‘z)

q.en: Why do you think learning English is important for your future career? How does it relate to your goals? (80-100 words)
q.uz: Siz uchun ingliz tilini bilish nima uchun muhim? Bu sizning kelajakdagi maqsadlaringiz bilan qanday bog‘liq? (80-100 so’z)

q.en: If you can't solve a math problem for an hour, what would be your next steps? (30-50 words)
q.uz: Agar siz bir soat davomida bir matematik masalani yecha olmasangiz, keyingi qadamlaringiz qanday bo‘ladi? (30-50 so‘z)

q.en: Think of a mathematical concept that was difficult for you at first but you later understood. What helped you? (30-50 words)
q.uz: Oldin sizga qiyin tuyulgan, ammo keyin tushungan matematik tushunchani ayting. Nima yordam berdi? (30-50 so‘z)

q.en: How would you explain the concept of 'infinity' or 'limit' to a 10-year-old? (50-80 words)
q.uz: “Cheksizlik” yoki “limit” tushunchasini 10 yoshli bolaga qanday tushuntirgan bo‘lardingiz? (50-80 so‘z)

q.en: What can be divided by zero? (30-50 words)
q.uz: Nimani no’lga bo’lsa bo’ladi? (30-50 so’z)

q.en: If you were accepted into this program, how many hours per week would you be willing to dedicate to problem-solving? Why? (50-80 words)
q.uz: Agar siz ushbu dasturga qabul qilinsangiz, har haftada necha soatni masala yechish uchun bag‘ishlashga tayyorsiz? Nega? (50-80 so‘z)

q.en: If bread is a main food in a village and grain production decreases, what happens to the price of bread? (30-50 words)
q.uz: Agar bir qishloqda non asosiy oziq-ovqat bo‘lsa va g‘alla (grain) yetishtirish kamayib ketsa, non narxiga nima bo‘ladi?  (30-50 so‘z)

q.en: Tell us about a recent economic issue in Uzbekistan or the world that you find interesting. What are your thoughts on it? (80-100 words)
q.uz: O‘zbekiston yoki dunyodagi yaqinda sizni qiziqtirgan bir iqtisodiy muammoni ayting. Bu haqida fikringiz qanday? (80-100 so‘z)

q.en: How do you think the economy affects your daily life? Give a real-life example. (50-80 words)
q.uz: Iqtisodiyot sizning kundalik hayotingiz bilan qanday bog‘langan? Hayotiy misol keltiring. (50-80 so‘z)

q.en: If you were given 100,000 UZS to start a small business, what would you do with it? (30-50 words)
q.uz: Agar sizga 100,000 so‘m berilsa va bu pulga kichik biznes boshlash topshirilsa, nima qilgan bo‘lardingiz? (30-50 so‘z)

q.en: If you were in a village without electricity, what system or device would you try to create to help the community? (50-80 words)
q.uz: Agar siz elektr energiyasi bo‘lmagan bir qishloqda bo‘lsangiz, jamoaga yordam berish uchun qanday tizim yoki qurilma yasashga harakat qilgan bo‘lardingiz? (50-80 so‘z)

q.en: How would you solve any current problem at your school or home using engineering? (50-80 words)
q.uz: Maktabingizda yoki uyingizda muammo bo‘lib turgan biror narsani muhandislik orqali qanday hal qilgan bo‘lardingiz?(50-80 so‘z)

q.en: Imagine you are in a situation where there is no electricity, and your phone is running out of battery. What would you do? (50-80 words)
q.uz: Elektr yo‘q, telefon quvvatdan tushmoqda. Nima qilar edingiz? (50-80 so‘z)

q.en: Tell us about a project (YouTube videos, science exhibitions, experiments) that you are interested in building or creating. (30-50 words)
q.uz: Sizni qurish yoki yasashga qiziqtirgan bir loyiha (YouTube videolari, ilmiy ko‘rgazmalar, tajribalar) haqida gapirib bering.(30-50 so‘z)

q.en: What is the difference between a traditional machine and a 'learning' machine? (30-50 words)
q.uz: Oddiy mashina bilan “o‘rganadigan” mashina o‘rtasidagi farq nimada? (30-50 so‘z)

q.en: If you were to teach a computer to recognize your friend's face, what steps would you take? (30-50 words)
q.uz: Agar siz kompyuterga do‘stingizning yuzini tanishni o‘rgatmoqchi bo‘lsangiz, qanday qadamlar qo‘ygan bo‘lardingiz? (30-50 so‘z)

q.en: Even if you have no programming experience, what would you do in the next month to understand artificial intelligence? (50-80 words)
q.uz: Sizda dasturlash tajribasi bo‘lmasa ham, keyingi bir oyda sun’iy intellektni tushunish uchun nima qilgan bo‘lardingiz? (50-80 so‘z)

q.en: Do you think machines can become smarter than humans in the future? Why or why not? (50-80 words)
q.uz: Sizningcha, kelajakda mashinalar odamdan aqlli bo‘lishi mumkinmi? (50-80 so‘z)
